description: This is the most basic type.

basic.description: Basic types don't have system:object added by default to the embedded types.

embed.description: Types which this should embed - system:object is always added unless base = true.

is.description: Array of interface types that this type should support

native.description: This is the native json type that represents this type. If omitted, default is object.

exclude.description: Exclude this type from the generated json?

fields.description: Each field is listed with it's type

rule.description: Embedded type that defines restriction rules for this type. By convention, the ID should be this type prefixed with the @ character.
